artistmod:ColorfulClobber.NAME: Colorful Clobber
artistmod:ColorfulClobber.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Clear: Paint 1 random Color.

artistmod:ColorCopy.NAME: Color Copy
artistmod:ColorCopy.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 Color on your Canvas to Paint.
artistmod:ColorCopy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose 1 Color on your Canvas to Paint.

artistmod:ChosenColors.NAME: Chosen Colors
artistmod:ChosenColors.DESCRIPTION: Chromatic: Add a copy of the Canvas into your hand.

artistmod:ArtificialArt.NAME: Abstruse Abstraction
artistmod:ArtificialArt.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of the Canvas into your hand. NL Exhaust.
artistmod:ArtificialArt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of the Canvas into your hand. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

artistmod:WatercolorWhap.NAME: Watercolor Wallop
artistmod:WatercolorWhap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all non-Painting cards drawn this way.

artistmod:RadicalRainbows.NAME: Gayness Generator
artistmod:RadicalRainbows.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Paint 1 [oobley]Rainbow.
artistmod:RadicalRainbows.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Paint 1 [oobley]Rainbow.

artistmod:BanefulBucket.NAME: Baneful Bucket
artistmod:BanefulBucket.DESCRIPTION: Chromatic: Double the amount of Paint on the Canvas. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:DeepDream.NAME: Pollock's Potluck
artistmod:DeepDream.DESCRIPTION: Paint 1 of each Color. NL Exhaust.
artistmod:DeepDream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Paint 1 of each Color. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:RedReaper.NAME: Ruby Reaper
artistmod:RedReaper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Paint !M! [#b0120a]Red. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:BlueBarrier.NAME: Cerulean Coverage
artistmod:BlueBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.  NL Paint !M! [#303f9f]Blue. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:GreenGreatness.NAME: Verdant Vainglory
artistmod:GreenGreatness.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Paint !M! [#42bd41]Green. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:YellowYouth.NAME: Coruscating Corona
artistmod:YellowYouth.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Paint 1 [#ffeb3b]Yellow.
artistmod:YellowYouth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Paint 1 [#ffeb3b]Yellow.

artistmod:AquaAnger.NAME: Aquamarine Aposematism
artistmod:AquaAnger.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Paint 2 [#26a69a]Aqua. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:MagentaMist.NAME: Fuschia Fugue
artistmod:MagentaMist.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Paint 2 [#880e4f]Magenta. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:BigBrown.NAME: Roseate Rejuvenation
artistmod:BigBrown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Paint !M! [#f0749e]Pink. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:ProfoundPurple.NAME: Mauve Malediction
artistmod:ProfoundPurple.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Cursed to ALL enemies. NL Paint 3 [#673ab7]Purple. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:BlackBang.NAME: Combustive Chiaroscuro
artistmod:BlackBang.DESCRIPTION: [#000000]Darken [#000000]the [#000000]Canvas X times. NL Next turn, gain [E] . NL Exhaust.
artistmod:BlackBang.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL [#000000]Darken [#000000]the [#000000]Canvas X times. NL Next turn, gain [E] . NL Exhaust.

artistmod:DoubleDemolition.NAME: Double Demolition
artistmod:DoubleDemolition.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Chromatic: Paint 1 more of both Colors.

artistmod:RainbowRazor.NAME: Rainbow Razor
artistmod:RainbowRazor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Paint 1 random Color.
artistmod:RainbowRazor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Paint 2 random Colors.

artistmod:RaringRepaint.NAME: Raring Repaint
artistmod:RaringRepaint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a Painting from your discard pile to your hand.
artistmod:RaringRepaint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Return a Painting from your discard pile to your hand.

artistmod:ArtisticAgony.NAME: Cosummate Conflagration
artistmod:ArtisticAgony.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL your Paintings. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Painting Exhausted. NL Exhaust.
artistmod:ArtisticAgony.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust ALL your Paintings. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Painting Exhausted. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:ChromaCrash.NAME: Chroma Crash
artistmod:ChromaCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Chromatic: Gain [E] and draw 1 card.

artistmod:PaintbrushPanic.NAME: Paintbrush Panic
artistmod:PaintbrushPanic.DESCRIPTION: Paint X random Colors. NL Exhaust.
artistmod:PaintbrushPanic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Paint X+1 random Colors. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:ClearChroma.NAME: Clear Chroma
artistmod:ClearChroma.DESCRIPTION: Clear: Paint 1 random Color. NL Chromatic: Paint 1 more of both Colors.
artistmod:ClearChroma.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Clear: Paint 1 random Color. NL Chromatic: Paint 1 more of both Colors.

artistmod:CanvasCatapult.NAME: Canvas Catapult
artistmod:CanvasCatapult.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a random card in your hand.
artistmod:CanvasCatapult.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

artistmod:IndigoIncapitation.NAME: Indigo Incapitation
artistmod:IndigoIncapitation.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Clear: Paint 1 [#303f9f]Blue.

artistmod:RedRazzing.NAME: Red Razzing
artistmod:RedRazzing.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Clear: Paint 1 [#b0120a]Red.

artistmod:PrismaticPain.NAME: Prismatic Puncture
artistmod:PrismaticPain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and draw 1 card for every Color on the Canvas.

artistmod:VibrantVision.NAME: Vibrant Vision
artistmod:VibrantVision.DESCRIPTION: Paint 1 random Color. NL Draw !M! card.

artistmod:EnlightenedEpiphany.NAME: Enlightened Epiphany
artistmod:EnlightenedEpiphany.DESCRIPTION: Add a random card with Paint into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:FantasyForm.NAME: Fantasy Form
artistmod:FantasyForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Painting, draw 1 card.
artistmod:FantasyForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Painting, draw 2 cards.

artistmod:MysteriousMasterpiece.NAME: Mysterious Masterpiece
artistmod:MysteriousMasterpiece.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Permanently add a Painting based on the Canvas to your deck. NL Fleeting.
artistmod:MysteriousMasterpiece.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Grave. NL Permanently add a Painting based on the Canvas to your deck. NL Fleeting.

artistmod:SuperbSchooling.NAME: Superb Schooling
artistmod:SuperbSchooling.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Chromatic: Draw !M! cards.

artistmod:DoubleDraw.NAME: Double Draw
artistmod:DoubleDraw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Put a random Painting from your discard pile into your hand.
artistmod:DoubleDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Put a random Painting from your discard pile into your hand.

artistmod:InsaneInspiration.NAME: Insane Inspiration
artistmod:InsaneInspiration.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile. NL If it's a Painting, play this again.

artistmod:SimpleStudies.NAME: Simple Studies
artistmod:SimpleStudies.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Chromatic: Shuffle a copy of the Painting into your draw pile.

artistmod:HorridHarvest.NAME: Horrid Harvest
artistmod:HorridHarvest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals unblocked damage to a Cursed enemy, Paint 1 [#f0749e]Pink.

artistmod:BluishBludgeon.NAME: Bluish Bludgeon
artistmod:BluishBludgeon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Clear: Paint 1 [#303f9f]Blue.

artistmod:ReddeningRampage.NAME: Reddening Rampage
artistmod:ReddeningRampage.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Paint 1 [#b0120a]Red.
artistmod:ReddeningRampage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Paint 1 [#b0120a]Red.

artistmod:BlueBrews.NAME: Blue Brews
artistmod:BlueBrews.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Paint 1 [#303f9f]Blue.
artistmod:BlueBrews.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Paint 1 [#303f9f]Blue.

artistmod:GrowingGreens.NAME: Growing Greens
artistmod:GrowingGreens.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Paint 1 [#42bd41]Green.
artistmod:GrowingGreens.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Paint 1 [#42bd41]Green.

artistmod:AccursedAggression.NAME: Accursed Aggression
artistmod:AccursedAggression.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy attacks you, apply !M! Cursed to it.
artistmod:AccursedAggression.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever an enemy attacks you, apply !M! Cursed to it.

artistmod:GloriousGallery.NAME: Glorious Gallery
artistmod:GloriousGallery.DESCRIPTION: Put all Paintings from your draw pile into your hand. NL Put all Paintings from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:PaintProfusion.NAME: Paint Profusion
artistmod:PaintProfusion.DESCRIPTION: Chromatic: Paint !M! random Color. NL Shuffle 2 copies of the Painting into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
artistmod:PaintProfusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Chromatic: Paint !M! random Colors. NL Shuffle 2 copies of the Painting into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:PurplePurpose.NAME: Purple Purpose
artistmod:PurplePurpose.DESCRIPTION: Paint 2 [#673ab7]Purple. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

artistmod:ArdentAqua.NAME: Ardent Aqua
artistmod:ArdentAqua.DESCRIPTION: Paint !M! [#26a69a]Aqua. NL Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:MeanMagenta.NAME: Mean Magenta
artistmod:MeanMagenta.DESCRIPTION: Paint !M! [#880e4f]Magenta. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

artistmod:TreasureTrove.NAME: Treasure Trove
artistmod:TreasureTrove.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Uncommon card into your hand.

artistmod:CrushingCanvas.NAME: Crushing Canvas
artistmod:CrushingCanvas.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your Paintings.

artistmod:IchorInk.NAME: Ichor Ink
artistmod:IchorInk.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take unblocked attack damage, Paint !M! random Color.
artistmod:IchorInk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Whenever you take unblocked Attack damage, Paint !M! random Color.

artistmod:PaintBreath.NAME: Hue Huffer
artistmod:PaintBreath.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Paint 1 random Color for each Painting played this turn.
artistmod:PaintBreath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Paint 1 random Color for each Painting played this turn.

artistmod:PaintballPelt.NAME: Paintball Pelt
artistmod:PaintballPelt.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Painting, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

artistmod:DualDash.NAME: Dual Dash
artistmod:DualDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Chromatic: Apply 1 Weak.
